channel.description: Recent content in Asyncopenai on MikesBlog

item.title: Scaling OpenAI With AsyncOpenAI
item.description: As I stood outside and looked at the neighborhood wasteland that post-July 4th left behind, the whiff of gunpowder still hanging in the air, I felt a burst of good neighbor energy flow through me, so I grabbed a broom. Sweeping up the street gave me time to think about the other chores I had for the day, including the writing of a new blog post, and I began to wonder how I could use ChatGPT to help me speed some things up.
